```dockerfile
- Multi-stage Docker builds

- Minimal attack surface
- Distroless runtime images
- Security context constraints
```

#### Kubernetes Security Controls
```yaml
securityContext:
  runAsNonRoot: true
  runAsUser: 1000
  readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
  allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  capabilities:
    drop: [ALL]
```
